title: Is Belusi "deleted" gender-specific words from use in the House of Representatives?
subtitle: The right-wing observers and commentators responded angryly to the proposals made by the President of the Democratic House of Representatives in January 2021. But what did she actually say?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2021, Speaker Nancy Belusi and other Democrats proposed prohibiting, eliminating or eliminating the use of specific gender language in the United States House of Representatives.
